dict.string: The Chart control can plot over 20 chart types ranging from line charts to specialized financial charts.

TYPES,Line,Step Line,Spline,Column,Bar,Area,Spline Area,Step Area,Pie,Semi Pie,Doughnut,Semi Doughnut,Pyramid,Funnel,Bubble,Scatter,Range Column,Range Area,Candle,OHLC,Polar,Radar,Stacked Column,100% Stacked Column,Stacked Bar,100% Stacked Bar,Stacked Area,100% Stacked Area

FEATURES,Live Update,ChartAnnotation,AxisCrossing,Category Axis,Numerical Axis,Logarithmic Axis,Strip Lines,Multiple Axes,Trackball,Data Point Selection,Zooming and Panning,Vertical Chart,Tooltip,Data Marker,Auto Scrolling,Technical Indicators
The data grid control for Xamarin is a high-performance grid component that is used to display the data in a tabular format.
The DataSource is a non-UI component that consumes raw data and processes data operations such as sorting, filtering, and grouping.
The Kanban control is an efficient way to visualize a workflow at each stage of its completion.
Sunburst Chart is useful for visualizing hierarchical data.
ImageEditor allows user to editing the images like adding shapes, text and rotating.
Picker allows user to pick an item from the options provided.
Gauge displays a range of values graphically along with the linear scale or circular scale or digital mode
A sparkline is a very small chart, typically drawn without axes or coordinates. It presents the general shape of dataâ€™s in a simple and highly condensed way.
Treemap control provides a simple yet effective way to visualize flat or hierarchical data as clustered rectangles,with a specific weighted attribute of the rectangle.
Maps control provides a graphical representation of geographical data. It is used to represent the statistical data of a particular geographical area on Earth.
Schedule provides all the common scheduling functionalities to create and manage appointments as well as exposes a gesture friendly UI.
Calendar widget provides the multi-view representation to display and select one or more dates.
RadialMenu displays menu in a circular layout. It can expose more menu items in the same space than traditional menus.
The Range navigator control provides an intuitive interface for selecting a smaller range from a larger collection.
SfPullToRefresh is a pullable panel which on pulling down the main content in order to refresh the data in the application
Barcode used to encode texts by using supported symbol types that comprises one and two dimensional Barcodes
NavigationDrawer is a sliding panel menu that comes out from the edge of the window and allows to have the menu in a hidden panel.
AutoComplete functionality provides suggestions to the user while typing.
NumericTextBox is an advanced version of the EditText control that restricts input to numeric values.
The DataForm control helps to develop various forms such as login, reservation and data entry, etc.It displays properties in list or grid layout.
RangeSlider control allows you to select the range of value within the specified minimum and maximum limits.
Animated controls can be used to indicate busy status during application loading, data processing/validation, etc
Rating control provides the number of stars that represents a rating.
Carousel control allows navigating through image data in an interactive way so that they can be viewed or selected.
Rotator is a data control used to display image data and navigate through them.
NumericUpDown control restricts input to numeric values.
Presentation is a .NET class library that can read, write and modify Microsoft PowerPoint files (*.pptx only).
XlsIO is a .NET class library that can read, write and modify Microsoft Excel documents.
DocIO is a .NET class library that can read, write and modify Microsoft Word documents.
PDF is a .NET class library that can create and modify PDF files.
PDF viewer is a new control that allows PDF documents to be viewed within your Xamarin iOS application.
Calculate is an independent class library that allows you to provide extensive calculation support to your business objects.
The Diagram control allows to create different types of diagrams such as flow charts, use case diagrams, workflow process diagrams and more.
